Title: Enacts the wetlands homeowner's relief act
Summary: Enacts the wetlands homeowner's relief act; provides that a homeowner who currently lives within a wetlands designated area shall not have to apply for a building permit for use of land within a fifty foot periphery of the house and garage; provides that new maps may not be issued without prior approval from the legislature; prohibits DEC from delineating wetlands beyond the boundaries shown on official wetlands maps.
LawCode: Add ยง24-0303, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to enacting the wetlands homeowner's relief act
